mapper.insert: insert into xiaoyaoji.project (id, name, description, teamId, createTime, userId, status, permission, environments, details) values (#{id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teamid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{environments,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{details,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update xiaoyaoji.project set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, teamId = #{teamid,jdbcType=CHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=CHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, environments = #{environments,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, details = #{details,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select id, name, description, teamId, createTime, userId, status, permission, environments, details from xiaoyaoji.project where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
